Heroes_Villains.entities.items

Class ItemHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heroes_Villains.entities.items.ItemHandler

  • public class ItemHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Is the class that contains all the items in the game so they can be added to the shop and inventory.
